name: Shell Execution
description: Standard tools for file processing and system operations.

patterns.task: List all files in the directory
List files with specific extension
Calculate file size (with path)
Identify the largest file from the list
patterns.recommended: echo "${input}" | xargs -d '\n' du -b | sed 's/\t/ /' | sort -nr | head -n 1 | cut -d' ' -f2-

patterns.task: Identify the smallest file from the list
patterns.recommended: echo "${input}" | xargs -d '\n' du -b | sed 's/\t/ /' | sort -n | head -n 1 | cut -d' ' -f2-
